name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring expertise in **Ruby** and **Ruby on Rails**, complemented by a strong understanding of **Postgres** databases. My technical skills include data ingestion and development of reconciliation pipelines, particularly in the context of **Fintech** and **Taxtech** domains, with a keen focus on compliance and innovation in **Open Banking** and **Blockchain** solutions.

My strengths in async communication ensure cohesive teamwork and effective project execution, while I emphasize code quality and system performance through adherence to software design principles. I am experienced in crafting technical documentation that aids in clear communication and knowledge sharing across teams.

In my previous roles, I leveraged modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build high-performance solutions, while leading the development of enterprise-grade applications utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I possess deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS** and have implemented robust microservices architectures along with CI/CD automation strategies. Furthermore, my exposure to AI/ML pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** underpins my capacity to drive innovative data-driven solutions.
